alert.note: Alert for Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 7:06AM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze to around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Wayne and Pike counties. In New York, Madison, Chenango, Otsego, Delaware and Sullivan counties. * WHEN...through 9 AM EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on untreated back roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For Otsego and Delaware Counties, freezing rain will mainly be confined to lower lying valley locations. For all areas, freezing rain will gradually change to rain early this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be found online at 511pa.com and 511ny.org, or by calling 511.
